title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds, brown, black and lavender applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied (by brush?) over resist. Yellow applied by brush over blue for green (chintz).
description: Fragment of a palampore. Architectural shapes and plants. The border changes direction.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds, brown, black and lavender applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied (by brush?) over resist. Yellow applied by brush over blue for green (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-35.
